title: Chrome Caretaker
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed photorealistic render, 8K ultra HD, cinematic volumetric lighting, a full-body shot of a highly polished chrome humanoid android (robot) with glowing blue eyes, meticulously watering a dense arrangement of vibrant houseplants (monstera, succulents) on a wooden tiered shelf. The robot holds a silver watering can, pouring water into a terracotta pot. The setting is a spacious, sunlit artist's studio loft with huge arched industrial windows, exposed white brick walls, wooden ceiling beams, and a concrete floor. Dramatic natural daylight streaming through the windows, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the metallic surfaces. Depth of field. Vertical composition, 9:16 aspect ratio. Photorealistic style, hyperdetailed texture.
